entry.title: September 27, 2018 meetup
entry.content:
• Infrastructure-as-Code: VSTS, Azure and the glue of PowerShell by Jeff Wouters
  • Azure Cloud Shell and SHiPS by Steven Taylor
  • Stick to the full potential of PowerShell by Christof Van Geendertaelen
  • Function ctrl-c {} by Merlijn Van Waeyenberghe
  • Too late for a complex ARM template by Ivo Haagen

Hosted at Xylos Register here! Github slides and demo
entry.summary: Infrastructure-as-Code: VSTS, Azure and the glue of PowerShell by Jeff Wouters Azure Cloud Shell and SHiPS by Steven Taylor Stick to the full potential of PowerShell by Christof Van Geendertaelen Function ctrl-c {} by Merlijn Van Waeyenberghe Too late for a complex ARM template by Ivo Haagen

entry.title: June 7, 2018 meetup
entry.content:
• Moving Your DSC Pull Server into the future by Ben Gelens
  • Flexible PowerShell logging without reinventing the wheel by Kim Oppalfens
  • My PowerShell development aids, Stijn Callebaut

Hosted at itnetX Belgium

Register here! Github slides and demo
